channel.title: nginx-unit on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in nginx-unit on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Run python wsgi server on NGINX Unit
item.description: With the release of NGINX Unit, I feel that I can use it as an application server that runs WSGI for Python. For the time being, I tried to run Hello World. Trial environment vagrant ubuntu/xenial64 python3.5 Install NGINX Unit Install the ubuntu package version referring to here. https://github.com/nginx/unit#ubuntu-packages And start $ sudo service unitd start #Create python application Create a python application with wsgi. Place a file called wsgi.
